enhanced_by.reason: The description is used in the toString method to build the string representation.
The since version is used in the toString method to build the string representation.
The forRemoval flag is used in the toString method to build the string representation.
The getDescription method is invoked within the toString method to retrieve the description.
The getSince method is invoked within the toString method to retrieve the since version.
The isForRemoval method is invoked within the toString method to check if the option is subject to removal.
